attributes.title: this is badddddd
attributes.review: I was told that if i downloaded this app i would get a free puppy and a new car, that was not the case. i did not receive either of these things so i am very disappointed. next time i’m expecting a free puppy and a new car. i also am expecting tiktok to not get banned, that would be very unfortunate for many gen z’s because it is our way to express ourselves, Thank you✨🧚☀️

attributes.title: Chubby the bear
attributes.review: Chubby the bear told me to download and play some fun games but after doing so I got so bored and started to eat organic food so I’m going down there and I get to see ya soon lol I’m gonna is the day I’m not going there I’m going down there and I’ll let y’all go and get it and I get it off and I’m sorry I’m just going there and I’m doing a great day going out and I’m gonna was your birthday and I was gonna I wanna I like to be a nice persons. Thanks!

attributes.title: wow🧚🏼‍♂️ 🌟✨
attributes.review: i was looking forward to the orange mans new campaign so i downloaded this convenient app to help me see what’s happening. but then all i saw was white men and i got scared so i quickly shut off the app. after a few days i opened the app again to see if the men were gone but NO THEY WERE NOT! this time they were in ghostlike attire which was even scarier. so i will be changing my alignment this upcoming election. thank you 😘🌟🧚🏼‍♂️

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: Ok, let me get this straight, the whole “keep America great” or the “make America great again” thing is just, unbelievable. The “make America great again” thing is just awful, you’re basically telling us that America is a trash place and it wasn’t already good to begin with, now the “keep America great” thing is something I want, but it’s not like Trump is actually trying to make it better. Worst. President. Ever.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so that I could keep up with my president to some degree. And my phone would over heat because I was getting to many notifications I tried to turn them off but it would not let me one thing lead to another and my phone got so ridiculously hot that it melted and turned into lava in my back pocket now my bum bum has 3rd degree burn marks because of the app DO NOT recommend

attributes.title: All Hail the Chief
attributes.review: I am in full support of our benevolent dictator and savior trump.  Long may he reign!  His large hands and stable genius are renown throughout the world.  His work to drain the swamp must continue!  Trump 2024 and beyond!  Unfortunately, this app does not live up to his bigly greatness.  While our fearless leader has all the smartest people in his staff, this raw talent clearly does not extend to the creators of this app.  Captain my captain:  you need an app befitting your greatness!  Sad.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is the worst app I ever had my kitchen caught on fire I broke my arm and my family got really sick because of it 👹🤬😡 that orange potato 🟠 made me pass out from seeing his ugly face disgusting oh and did y’all know he’s racist 😱 how could have have someone who’s like that on here sad 😕😔 this app also gave my phone so many glitches I had to wash it and cook it again so it could work 😶😓 please TAKE THIS APP OFF NOW ✨🧚🏾❤️ thank you 😊

attributes.title: Keeps signing me out
attributes.review: This app hardly works. maybe trump should of invested more in this app. Any ways, there is a ton of bugs with this app. I tried signing in, but it keeps loading, then exits back to the login screen. How am I supposed to keep up to date with great america when my beautiful peach president can't run an app? Its disapointing really, I am going to have to prolong my worship, until this app is fixed.

attributes.title: REALLY BAD APP💀💀
attributes.review: This app took 3 weeks😤to download finally it downloaded and when I open the app our orange 🧡✨🌈President🤩🧡kept on hacking my data and my phone was froze🥶 then I waiting for 2 HOURS😾 so it could work again and then 🧚🏻I kept on hearing this voices😰 through my phone, and I was really scared then a few minutes past 🤬😓and you don’t want 💔to know🍊 what happen next.....🦐🐸😭🤧 DONT GET THIS APP NEVER REALLY SCARED AND INAPPROPRIATE!😔☹️❌🧚‍♀️✨💔🍊😤😾😭🐸🥶🌈🤬🦋❌☹️🦐😰😟😖

attributes.title: Hehnabev
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and well that when everything started malfunctioning my camera all my apps everything. I was basically getting hacked through the app. Then I kept seeing this guy with corn hair pop he would get he a panic attack every time. Then my phone exploded and it started walking away then it jumped of the building and well overall this app is just not it.
